text: Hazard is a 1948 American comedy-drama movie directed by George Marshall and starring Paulette Goddard, Macdonald Carey, Fred Clark, Stanley Clements, Percy Helton, Maxie Rosenbloom, Frank Fenton, Frank Faylen, Walter Baldwin. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1948 comedy movies Category:1948 drama movies Category:1940s comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by George Marshall Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Hazard (1948 movie)
